MAIN.TITLE: Buy, sell and swap crypto with ease
MAIN.DESCRIPTION: Seamlessly trade, buy, and sell your favorite cryptocurrencies on a platform designed for both beginners and seasoned traders

ACTIONS.TITLE: Coming Soon on iOS and Android

ABOUT.TITLE: Who we are
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
Welcome to OpenCrypt, where speed meets simplicity in crypto trading. We’re here to help you buy, sell, and trade digital assets faster than ever. No more waiting around—just quick, seamless transactions that keep you ahead of the game. 
 Whether you’re a pro or just getting started OpenCrypt is your fast track to the future of finance. Let’s accelerate your crypto journey together.

PROBLEM.TITLE: Problem
PROBLEM.DESCRIPTION: Most crypto exchanges, in their rush to add features, have lost sight of simplicity and speed. Bogged down by cluttered interfaces and unnecessary options, they turn basic transactions into a frustrating ordeal. For users looking to quickly exchange assets, these bloated platforms are more of a hindrance than a help.

SOLUTION.TITLE: Solution
SOLUTION.DESCRIPTION: At OpenCrypt, we’ve eliminated the clutter and focused on what truly matters—speed and simplicity. Our streamlined platform is designed to make trading fast, intuitive, and hassle-free, allowing you to execute transactions with ease and without delays. We know your time is valuable, so we’ve built OpenCrypt to help you make the most of it in the crypto world.

TOAST.SUCCESS: Thank you, you are now in the waitlist
